user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable and supportive bras that cater to my size, while also ensuring they are stylish and provide good value for money.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to this product because of its supportive design and flattering neckline, which I felt would enhance my confidence. The positive aspects mentioned in the review, such as the lightweight feel and adjustable features, were significant factors in my decision. I also appreciated the value for money, as I was looking for a good quality bra that wouldn't break the bank.

I chose this item primarily for its wire-free design and comfort features, which I found appealing for everyday wear. The review highlighted the nice back support and the snug fit, which aligned with my need for comfort and support. The fact that I had previously purchased it again indicated a level of satisfaction with its performance.

My decision to try this product was based on its promise to fit and flatter fuller figures, which is a priority for me. However, the negative experience of it running too small led to my disappointment and return. This experience made me realize the importance of accurate sizing in my purchasing decisions.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, support, and a good fit, especially in clothing and undergarments. I value features like moisture-wicking fabrics, seamless designs, and adjustable components that enhance usability and comfort. I appreciate items that are well-made and provide a flattering appearance, particularly for full-figured options. However, I tend to dislike products that are poorly sized, uncomfortable when sitting, or that do not provide the promised support. I also have a preference for items that are easy to use and convenient, such as no-tie shoelaces. Overall, I look for quality and practicality in my purchases.
